intent_atoms.description: FullBoxReader must correctly extract version and flags from a full box
App theming feature including icon rasterization and light/dark mode support
Random slice benchmark suite executed on macOS with Combine support to compare mapped vs chunked readers under identical workloads
ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests run on macOS with XCTest UI support to validate end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow
Combine-backed UI benchmark executed on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with CLI harness

functional_units.name: FullBoxReader
functional_units.description: Extracts version and flags from full boxes in media file parsing

functional_units.name: App Theming
functional_units.description: Provides icon rasterization and light/dark theme support for the application UI

functional_units.name: Random Slice Benchmark Suite
functional_units.description: Executes random slice benchmarks to compare mapped vs. chunked readers on macOS hardware

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests
functional_units.description: Runs SwiftUI automation flow tests for streaming UI selection on macOS

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI Benchmark
functional_units.description: Captures latency metrics for Combine-enabled UI on macOS while maintaining CLI throughput
